org.eclipse.update.configurator

Interface IPlatformConfigurationFactory

  • Deprecated. 
    The org.eclipse.update component has been replaced by Equinox p2. This API will be deleted in a future release. See bug 311590 for details.

    public interface IPlatformConfigurationFactory
    Factory for creating platform configurations.

    Note: This class/interface is part of an interim API that is still under development and expected to change significantly before reaching stability. It is being made available at this early stage to solicit feedback from pioneering adopters on the understanding that any code that uses this API will almost certainly be broken (repeatedly) as the API evolves.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPlatformConfiguration getCurrentPlatformConfiguration()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the current platform configuration.
      IPlatformConfiguration getPlatformConfiguration(URL url)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a platform configuration object, optionally initialized with previously saved configuration information.
      IPlatformConfiguration getPlatformConfiguration(URL url, URL loc)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a platform configuration object, optionally initialized with previously saved configuration information.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPlatformConfiguration

        IPlatformConfiguration getCurrentPlatformConfiguration()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the current platform configuration.
        Returns:
        platform configuration used in current instance of platform

      • getPlatformConfiguration

        IPlatformConfiguration getPlatformConfiguration(URL url)
                                                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a platform configuration object, optionally initialized with previously saved configuration information.
        Parameters:
        url - location of previously save configuration information. If null is specified, an empty configuration object is returned
        Returns:
        platform configuration used in current instance of platform
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPlatformConfiguration

        IPlatformConfiguration getPlatformConfiguration(URL url,
                                              URL loc)
                                                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a platform configuration object, optionally initialized with previously saved configuration information.
        Parameters:
        url - location of previously save configuration information. If null is specified, an empty configuration object is returned
        loc - location of the platform installation. Used to resolve entries in the saved location
        Returns:
        platform configuration used in current instance of platform
        Throws:
        IOException
